text: ام ءاتينهم كتبا من قبله فهم به مستمسكون

translations.translation: Or did We give them a Book before, which they are holding to?
Did We give them a Scripture before this to which they are holding fast?
Or did We bestow upon them a Book before on whose authority they are holding on (to angel-worship)?
Had We, before sending the Quran, given them a book to which they now refer as an authority?
Or have We given them some Book before this, to which they hold fast?
Or have We given them any Book before this (the Qur'an) to which they are holding fast
Or have We given them a book before it so that they hold fast to it?
Or did We bring them a Book aforetime to which they hold?
Or have We given them any scripture before (this Qur'an) so that they are holding fast thereto?
Have We given them a Book before this, to which they are holding fast?
Have We vouchsafed Unto them any Book before this, so that they are to it holding fast?
Did We give them a Book before this, so that they are holding fast to it?
What! have We given them a Book before this, to which they are holding fast?
Or have We given them any Book before this (the Quran), to which they are holding fast?
Or have We given them a Book before this which they hold fast to?
Or have We given them a book prior to this one, to which they adhere?
Or have We given them a book before the Qur'an to which they are adhering?
[43:21] Or have We brought them a scripture before, that is, [before] the Qur’ān, that they should worship other than God, so that they are holding fast to it? In other words, this never happened.
(Or have We given them any Scripture before) this Qur'an (so that they are holding fast thereto) so that they take such a belief from this Scripture?

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: أهم يدعون دليلاً عقلياً سواه على مدعاهم { أَمْ } يدعون دليلاً نقلياً بأن { آتَيْنَاهُمْ كِتَاباً مِّن قَبْلِهِ } أي: من قبل القرآن، مشتملاً على اتخاذهم وادعائهم المذكور؟! { فَهُم بِهِ مُسْتَمْسِكُونَ } [الزخرف: 21] متمسكون به في دعواهم هذه

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: قلت: ما تمسّكوا به من قوله: { لو شاء الرحمن ما عبدناهم } من الاحتجاج بالقدر، وهو لا ينفع هذه الدار، لأنه من التمسُّك بالحقيقة الخالية عن الشريعة، وهي بطالة وزندقة، ولذلك ردّهم الله تعالى إلى التمسُّك بالشريعة بقوله: { أم آتيناهم كتاباً مِن قبله } من قبل القرآن، أو: من قبل ادعائهم ذلك، ينطق بصحة ما يدّعونه، { فهم به مسْتَمْسِكون } آخذون
